entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a bank mentioned in the conversation. It was broken into by Harry.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards and witches that are waiting at the exits.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are a group of creatures that are waiting at the exits.

entities.name: teddy boot
entities.description: Teddy Boot is a person who got beaten up by Carrow for yelling about Harry's break-in to Gringotts in the Great Hall.

entities.name: carrow
entities.description: Carrow is a person who beat up Teddy Boot.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who broke into Gringotts and escaped on a dragon.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is the person having a conversation with Harry about his break-in to Gringotts.

relationships.description: Harry broke into Gringotts, as mentioned in the conversation.
Harry escaped on a dragon after breaking into Gringotts.
Teddy Boot got beaten up by Carrow for yelling about Harry's break-in to Gringotts in the Great Hall.
